org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist
Class InMemoryFormListHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.araneaframework.uilib.form.formlist.InMemoryFormListHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class InMemoryFormListHelper
extends Object
implements Serializable

Helper that facilitates holding the editable list rows in memory without saving them to database. Useful when the editable list should be persisted only in the very end of user session.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov at araneaframework dot org)
See Also:
Serialized Form
